Thiruvananthapuram

Thiruvananthapuram, often referred to as Trivandrum, is the capital city of the southern Indian state of Kerala. It is located on the southwestern coast of India, along the Arabian Sea. Thiruvananthapuram is known for its rich cultural heritage, historical landmarks, and natural beauty.

Things to do

Sree-Padmanabhaswamy Temple

Kovalam Beach

Ponmudi Hills

Poovar Island

Veli
